text: a look at the fact that we have a th000 total options in here and we started with just 50 then we started with another 50 and notice the time between these trades so we see from the 7th to the 20th to the 12th to the 18th so we can see sometime passes we're not scaling in right away and one of my favorite Parts here is we actually get to see a little bit of degenerate Behavior I use that term with all due respect and just love for the dude and what he does and I also identify as a degenerate I think that's what most of us are as Traders and I see he starts you know with five grand five grand five grand five grand and he you know he's buying when at 60 75 55 50 and then all of a sudden I see a 21 Grand block come in so then he grabs 200 at 30 this is the quintessential adding to a losing position scaling in now again I say that partially in just because a lot of the the standard methodology you will hear from a lot of Traders kind of like the can slim style specifically comes to mind but others as well where you don't want to add to losing trades I myself actually don't fully believe in that and I think that once you become a slightly more experienced Trader you get to explore these areas of nuance
